attributes.action: bring in legislation regarding COLD CALLING by phone from abroad outside of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government to look at methods used by Companies located in the United Kingdom, who directly or indirectly engage individuals or call centres outside of the EU to sell their products. Thereby negating the laws in this country and the EU. That those companies are required by law, that cold calls made by those means are subject to the same laws as if they had
been made within the EU. Also that once that call had been made whatever the outcome, the call number was then deleted for that particular project.
